pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, April 6, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Ahmed Hussen will participate in a roundtable with business leaders to discuss youth opportunities development.

Closed to media.

2:10 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Ahmed Hussen will participate in a basketball clinic with local youth, hosted by President of the Toronto Raptors Masai Ujiri.

OVO Athletic Centre
30 British Columbia Road

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.
  • Please note that non-marking footwear is required at all times.
